articles.description: Did a Chinese massage-parlor entrepreneur sell access to Donald Trump and his family?
articles.content: When New England Patriots owner Bob Kraft was first charged with solicitation, it didn’t appear to be much of a political story. It was of mild interest that Donald Trump was quick to give his friend/donor the benefit of the doubt, but this didn’t appear to b… [+2912 chars]

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Meacham: Why do those of faith put their trust in this prince?
articles.description: The president signed Bibles in Alabama on Friday while touring the devastation caused by tornadoes that killed 23 individuals. The panel discusses how some evangelicals can support Trump.

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Trump White House struggles to spin discouraging jobs news
articles.description: Donald Trump and Larry Kudlow are doing their best to downplay the latest job numbers. Funny, they peddled a very different message three years ago.
articles.content: May 2016 was the single worst month for the U.S. job market since the economic recovery began in 2010. The good news, though we didn’t know it at the time, was that May 2016 was something of a fluke: the economy bounced immediately, creating 282,000 jobs in J… [+2763 chars]
